SEARCH
Package cycling

Class StageResult

java.lang.Object
cycling.StageResult
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<StageResult>
public class StageResult extends Object implements Comparable<StageResult>, Serializable
Represents the result of a rider in a specific stage of a race.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Olly Johnson and Laith Al Qudah
See Also:

      riderId - The ID of the rider.
      checkpointTimes - An array of LocalTime objects representing the times at each checkpoint.
